Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two different habitats, one on land and one in water.
The student can include and label at least two different kinds of living things in each habitat in their drawing.
The student can observe and draw patterns showing the diversity of plants in each habitat.
The student can observe and draw patterns showing the diversity of animals in each habitat.
The student can compare and label similar and different living things found in the two habitats.
